data.message: Eminem the meet was good tonight u should have came... Eminem I apologize if u weren't trying 2 sublimnate me they made me think that. u wouldn't sublimnate  me would u?I hope not any Eminem i got thinking and god told me that you need 2 clean up your act...and it's time 2 settle down. So whit all that said u need to get back with Kim u love her i ani't dumb..now i got some experience in this dept. seen how's im's retied  pimp so this is what u should do. I was think maybe u could write her a letter .. now don't hit her with the guilt trip. Let her think she is right even if she wrong Eminem hey Eminem just bare with me ok... Eminem pay attention..you should use a light blue pen don't that way she will now you saw the light ..now start off bye saying Kim i no i was wrong ..and if u would just give me a 3 or 10th try i'm sure it will work this time ...and if u forgive me for being mean..and saying all that's stuff about you I will do my best to not let it happen again... Eminem don't talk marriage ok you will scare her off...ask her out on a date...and give her compliments ..tell her how good she looks ...then once u got her back play hard 2 get. tell her u don't want 2 rush back n 2 it..ya got take your time ...now I no she gonna be looking good and u gonna wanta take her straight 2 the room Eminem you still following me? i'm not gonna right this for you Eminem u need 2 take notes. Eminemif you have any more questions..i'm going 2 have 2 charge you..now there is such thing az happy endings. I know you cant do this Eminem all u got 2 do is tell her you was wrong. and if nobody told you today Eminem that they love you i love...your doing a great job pat your self on the back and take a brake...let me no how it turns out. 1 love slim or Eminem or what every the hell you call your self.
